name: TacoQuiz
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: taco quiz
des: This Alexa Skill gives user Spanish vocabulary quizzes. User will be prompted to choose how many vocabs he/she wants to be tested on. The user will then be prompted to say either a Spanish word or an English word upon given the meaning of the word in the other language. Alexa will then give instant feedback on whether or not the user is correct. If given the wrong answers in two consecutive runs, Alexa will give user the correct answer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
